name: 7 GENERATIONS
description:
7 generations is a soft skills based abstract game. 

Shape 7 strata by pressing the space bar. The curves must neither intersect with each other, nor touch the top and bottom edges of the screen. Play carefully to ensure the survival of the next generations.

Press space to go up and release to go down

Created during GameJam ARTE in 48h 

https://itch.io/jam/arte-game-jam
